content: Keyword Spreadsheet Keyword Research By: Rand Fishkin March 22, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin March 22, 2005 Keyword Spreadsheet Keyword Research The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. In reference to a thread at SEOChat on the anatomy of a good keyword by Robert Paulson, I have deleted the specific terms out of one of my own keyword spreadsheets and am offering it for download. You're welcome to re-use this and hopefully improve it in any way possible. It is certainly a rough estimation system and could use refinement. Remember to use right-click and "save target as...". Download Sample Keyword Spreadsheet in Excel [Update: no longer available] Copied! Back to Top
